data.name: Modo indie - Polystein Kit
data.detailed_description:
Pushing Points Polystein Kit is a Modo indie Kit consisting of an array of all-quad SubD mesh presets that can be seamlessly added to a model making mesh detailing incredibly easy. This powerful toolset positions, scales, orients and auto-stitches these mesh presets to your active mesh relieving you of the tedious process of doing it manually.

Want to use your own meshes with the Polystein Kit?

Use the Polystein Preset Creator and within minutes you're up and running. From vehicles, characters, weapons, environmental models and more, the Polystein Kit is a perfect addition to your modeling toolkit.

Polystein User Interface

You can access the Polystein Tools Palette by clicking on the Polystein icon found in the Modo Modes Tail. The Polystein Kit uses a Modo Preset Browser for easy navigation of the presets and comes with a pre-configured pie menu mapped to (Shift+F) that you can easily map to another keyboard short cut by using the "Map Polystein Pie" button.

Polystein in Your Hands

What will you create with the Polystein Kit?

Use the provided presets, add to the collection with presets created by other users or create your own and produce an endless collection of details to add to your meshes.

From vehicles, characters, weapons, environmental models and more, the Polystein Kit is a perfect addition to your modeling toolkit. We look forward to seeing your creations and hope you find this kit as useful in your workflow as we do.

data.short_description: Custom character feature presets for Modo indie that can be seamlessly added to an organic model with a single click of the mouse.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8 or Windows 10 (64-bit only)
  • Processor: Intel processor(s), Core i3 or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.10.x, 10.11.x and 10.12.x
  • Processor: Intel processor(s), Core i3 or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

data.legal_notice:
Polystein Kit is the property of Pushing Points and available for use as a DLC with Modo indie.

Pushing Points | - Copyright © William Vaughan -
